No one continues to be hurt more by the War on Drugs than people of color and low-income communities. It's time to end the failed federal prohibition of marijuana and right these wrongs by ensuring equal justice for those hit hardest.

Proud to join @SenBooker in this fight! https://twitter.com/SenBooker/status/1101107762271084544 …

Yesterday, I took to the Senate floor to tell my colleagues and the public why Andrew Wheeler is unfit to serve as the administrator of the @EPA.

Today, I voted NO on his confirmation. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L1A093G4Ev8&t=4s …

The Senate just confirmed a former coal lobbyist to lead the federal agency tasked with protecting our health and environment. 
   
There have been a lot of bad days for the environment in the Trump administration, but today's vote will have devastating impacts for years to come.

I will vote NO on his nomination.

Proud to have worked to build on Oregon’s strong conservation legacy with final passage yesterday of the biggest public lands package in a decade. Once the bill is signed into law, Oregon will have the most wild and scenic river designations in the continental United States.

I am deeply saddened to hear about Secretary of State Dennis Richardson's passing. I so appreciated standing with him at services of the Oregon Fallen War Heroes Memorial in Central Point, which Dennis’s work made possible. My condolences to Cathy and his entire family.

Today, 7 top execs from the largest pharma companies will be testifying before @SenateFinance about the skyrocketing cost of prescription drugs. It’s time Big Pharma provide American families with answers about the unjustified expense of these medicines.

Drug companies have been getting away with highway robbery, denying access for too many Americans who count on insulin to stay alive. Our investigation will look at how Big Pharma & others set these prices. It's time that these companies answer to Congress & American families.
